Module kivakit.core.network.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.network.core

Class Port

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.network.core.Port
  • public class Port
extends java.lang.Object
    A host, port and protocol. The port has a number, accessible with number(), it exists on a Host and it speaks a given protocol().
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

      • parse

        public static Port parse​(java.lang.String port)
        Parses a port of the form "[host]:[port-number]". If the port number is omitted, port 80 is assumed.
        Returns:
        A port for the given string or null if the string is not a port
